details.condition: This product is in mint condition. There is no wear on the shoe and or wear on the box.

moredetails.title: Air Jordan 6 Retro Description
moredetails.description: Originally released in 2000, the Air Jordan 6 Midnight Navy colorway, at the time of the Air Jordan 6's 30th anniversary, Jordan Brand brought back the classic new color matching Air Jordan 6 Midnight Navy, Air Jordan 6 Midnight Navy This white shoe body is paired with a blue midsole and a crystal sole, making the whole pair of shoes simple and elegant! The whole pair of shoes is made of only two colors, and the white upper is made of high-quality, delicate leather. The tongue, shoe lift and midsole are made of midnight blue. The contrast between the two colors is strong, giving people a very eye-catching visual experience, revealing a simple and advanced design concept. The outsole uses blue with a crystal cheap jordans on sale base, and the white Jumpman Logo is used as an embellishment, echoing the color theme.

moredetails.title: Shipping & Returns
moredetails.description:
Welcome to our online store. Here you can get the full information about shipping & returns.
 Shipping: 
 1. Secure Shipping guaranteed: When you order the items and checkout, we would receive the information and process the orders within 24 hours, this time is included in gather the goods, package, contact shipping company and shipping the goods. 
 2. Please ensure the correct information you provide, such as consignee, address, email, telephone, etc. We would ship the goods to you according to the information, so please confirm 100% correct. 
 3. Through the tracking numbers you can track the process of your order. Secure shipment is guaranteed. If you do not receive the package in a month from the date we sent out, please contact us. 
 Returns: 
 We do our best to provide you 100% satisfaction. If you want to apply a return, please first contact our customer service and informed of the reason for returning. All items sent back to us must be complete in the original condition with all tags and labels: unused, not worn, altered or washed, etc. Within 30 days you can enjoy return service, over the period required we will not to return or exchange.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: How do you ship this?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.description:
We ship orders overseas by mail service. After finishing processing your order, we will send it to the shipping company and it will be completely handled by them. 
After arriving in your country, it will be handled by your country's postal service. So please kindly contact your local post when it arrives in your country.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: How has this been stored?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.description: Shipping cost depends on your exact location and shipping method. Pricing will depend on the country in which you reside, the shipping method, and the number of items that you are purchasing. Exact pricing can be found by clicking “Add To Cart” and entering your address before completing the check-out process.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: How do I authenticate it?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.description: As soon as your order is shipped, you will receive an email with your tracking number. This email will also include a link to our carrier's website where you will be able to track your package.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: Can I pick it up?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.description: We will send you the tracking code of your orders to the email that you filled down when placing your orders. This email will also guide you how to track your package. Please note that the tracking information will be displayed 2-5 days after you receive that email.

frequentlyAskedQuestions.title: Lorem ipsum question number 5?
frequentlyAskedQuestions.description: You should see tracking events within 48-72 hours after you have received the tracking number/ID. The reason for this time lag is that in most cases the first tracking event only shows up once the shipment was handed over to us.
